name: ApimRequests
content: requests | where customDimensions["Service ID"] == "apim-robo-test" | project timestamp     , subscription = tostring(customDimensions["Subscription Name"])     , api = tostring(customDimensions["API Name"])     , name     , success     , resultCode     , duration     , itemId     , sessionCorrelationId = tostring(customDimensions["Request-Session-Correlation-Id"])
